Key Match Events: Boston Celtics defeated the Denver Nuggets on the road with a 118-106 victory.
The Celtics got out to a hot start and looked like they were going to walk away with an easy win.
The shorthanded Nuggets, without reigning MVP Nikola Jokić, played tough, hard-nosed basketball.
Russell Westbrook and Jamal Murray stepped up in Jokić's absence.
Boston was the better team down the stretch and made enough plays in the fourth quarter to secure the win.
